📚 Fall 2024 Readings – NLP

The following texts are useful, but none are required. All of them can be read free online.

Title Authors Link
Speech and Language Processing Dan Jurafsky and James H. Martin View
Natural Language Processing Jacob Eisenstein View
A Primer on Neural Network Models for Natural Language Processing Yoav Goldberg View
Natural Language Processing With PyTorch Delip Rao and Brian McMahan View
Natural Language Processing with Transformers Lewis Tunstall, Leandro von Werra, and Thomas Wolf View
